description: Returns a list of pronunciation lexicons stored in an Amazon Web Services Region. For more information, see Managing Lexicons.

nested_items.name: Lexicons
nested_items.description: A list of lexicon names and attributes.

nested_items.name: Alphabet
nested_items.description: Phonetic alphabet used in the lexicon. Valid values are ipa and x-sampa.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: Language code that the lexicon applies to. A lexicon with a language code such as 'en' would be applied to all English languages (en-GB, en-US, en-AUS, en-WLS, and so on.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: Date lexicon was last modified (a timestamp value).

nested_items.name: LexiconArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lexicon.

nested_items.name: LexemesCount
nested_items.description: Number of lexemes in the lexicon.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: Total size of the lexicon, in characters.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use in the next request to continue the listing of lexicons. NextToken is returned only if the response is truncated.
